import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Grid, Image } from 'semantic-ui-react' import axios from 'axios'; const _MovieGenresList = () => { const [movieList, setMovieList] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios.get('https://api.themoviedb.org/3/discover/movie?api_key=224ce27b38a3805ecf6f6c36eb3ba9d0&with_genres=28') .then(x => { console.log(x.data.results) setMovieList([...movieList, { value : x.data.results.map(x => { return x.backdrop_path }) }]) // setMovieList( // x.data.results.map(x => { // console.log(x.back) // return x.backdrop_path; // })) }) .catch(err => { console.log(err) }) }, []); console.log(movieList) return ( { movieList.map(x =>
) }
) } export default _MovieGenresList
